resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82176</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82176</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>5018</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Exploring Sounds (1)</string>
            <string language="es">Exploración de sonidos (1)</string>
            <string language="ga">Fuaimeanna a Fhiosrú (1)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erforschende Töne (1)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bruits Les explorant (1)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sons Explorando (1)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Suoni D'Esplorazione (1)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να ερευνήσει τους ήχους (1)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Children produce sounds from objects in their environment, they listen to the sounds produced by the other children, learn how to vary the sounds, how to classify them and perform music with them. The idea of a 'Conductor' is introduced.</string>
            <string language="es">Los niños producen sonidos a partir de objetos de su medio ambiente, escuchan los sonidos producidos por otros niños, aprenden como varían los sonidos, cómo clasificarlos y crear música con ellos. Se introduce el concepto de un "Director de orquesta".</string>
            <string language="ga">Déanann na leanaí fuaimeanna leis na rudaí ina dtimpeallacht, éisteann siad leis na fuaimeanna a dhéanann na leanaí eile, an chaoi leis na fuaimeanna a athrú agus an chaoi iad a rangú agus ceol a sheinnt leo. Tugtar coincheap an 'Stiúrthóir' isteach.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Music</string>
            <string language="es">Música. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kinder produzieren Töne aus Nachrichten in ihrer
Umgebung, sie hören zu den Tönen, die von den anderen Kindern 
produziert werden, erlernen, wie man die Töne verändert, wie man sie
einstuft und Musik mit ihnen durchführt. Die Idee eines ' 
Leiters ' wird eingeführt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les enfants produisent des bruits à partir des 
objets dans leur environnement, ils écoutent les bruits produits par 
les autres enfants, apprennent comment changer les bruits, comment les
classifier et exécuter la musique avec eux. L'idée d'un 
'conducteur 'est présentée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As crianças produzem sons dos objetos em seu 
ambiente, elas escutam os sons produzidos pelas outras crianças, 
aprendem como variar os sons, como classificá-los e executar a 
música com eles. A idéia ' de um condutor ' é introduzida.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I bambini producono i suoni dagli oggetti nel 
loro ambiente, ascoltano i suoni prodotti dagli altri bambini, 
imparano come variare i suoni, come classificarli ed effettuare la 
musica con loro. L'idea 'di un conduttore 'è introdotta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα παιδιά παράγουν τους ήχους από τα αντικείμενα στο 
περιβάλλον τους, ακούνε τους ήχους που παράγονται από τα άλλα 
παιδιά, μαθαίνουν πώς να ποικίλουν τους ήχους, πώς να τους 
ταξινομήσουν και να εκτελέσουν τη μουσική με τους. Η ιδέα 
ενός "αγωγού" εισάγεται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
